page.title: 13The Blacksmith at Dinas
page.content: My name is Eifion;my dad is a Blacksmith.You may think that the trade has changed a lot but it has only changed a little.The blacksmith's trade is very,very old and goes back to Norman times when William the Conqueror reigned.In those times blacksmiths shoed horses and made tools but did not make gates.This is what my dad does.He welds gates and takes then to Swansea for galvanizing;repairs balers, P.T.O. shafts for Tractors,and turbo hay mowers.He also sharpens carpenters' tools and makes doors for outside sheds and dismantles machinery. My father could shoe horses if there was a need -but there are not so many horses in the area now .The blacksmith's work has not really changed- only developed with the changing times
